entity.name: Prince Adewumi Adewale
entity.description: A digital strategist and developer focused on building intelligent, scalable solutions that merge technology with agriculture, health, and marketing. This work is built on FOSS principles.

projects.name: TessyFarm Nexus
projects.description: An open-source agri-tech platform that provides AI diagnostics and supply chain management for smart farming and improved market access.

channels.description: Support our collection of FOSS projects through our Open Collective page. All funds are publicly accounted for and directly support project growth and maintenance.

plans.name: General TessyFarm Support
plans.description: A recurring contribution to cover essential operational costs like server hosting and core maintenance specifically for the TessyFarm Nexus project.

plans.name: AI Model Development Grant
plans.description: A strategic one-time grant to fund the secure acquisition and processing of de-identified medical datasets for improving AI model accuracy.
